feed.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Oct 28 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 21 October 2024 through Monday, 28 October 2024🔗

Browser Support Changes: +45, -0

Support increases (45)

API

  1. api ➞ XRFrame ➞ fillJointRadii
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ XRFrame ➞ fillPoses
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ XRFrame ➞ getJointPose
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ XRHand ➞ @@iterator
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ XRHand
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ XRHand ➞ entries
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ XRHand ➞ forEach
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ XRHand ➞ get
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  9. api ➞ XRHand ➞ keys
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  17. api ➞ CSSMarginRule
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  18. api ➞ CSSMarginRule ➞ name
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  19. api ➞ CSSMarginRule ➞ style
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  20. api ➞ Request ➞ duplex
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ font-variant-emoji
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ bottom-center
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ bottom-left
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ bottom-right
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  7. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ left-bottom

    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  9. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ left-top
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  10. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ right-bottom
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  11. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ right-middle
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  12. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ right-top
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  13. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ top-center
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  14. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ top-left
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  15. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ top-left-corner
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  16. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ top-right
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  17. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ top-right-corner
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  18. css ➞ properties ➞ anchor-scope
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  19. css ➞ properties ➞ anchor-scope ➞ all
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  20. css ➞ properties ➞ anchor-scope ➞ none
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  21. css ➞ properties ➞ font-variant-emoji ➞ emoji
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  22. css ➞ properties ➞ font-variant-emoji ➞ normal
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  23. css ➞ properties ➞ font-variant-emoji ➞ text
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  24. css ➞ properties ➞ font-variant-emoji ➞ unicode
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  25. css ➞ selectors ➞ details-content
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 126

Show all 126 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (50)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 18 October 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ RTCDataChannel ➞ transferable
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ Request ➞ keepalive
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ fetch ➞ init_keepalive_parameter
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ PaymentManager ➞ secure_context_required
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ PaymentRequestUpdateEvent ➞ secure_context_required
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ Request ➞ Request ➞ init_keepalive_parameter
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Clear-Site-Data ➞ cache
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. http ➞ headers ➞ Clear-Site-Data ➞ cookies
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. http ➞ headers ➞ Clear-Site-Data ➞ storage
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. http ➞ headers ➞ Clear-Site-Data ➞ wildcard
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ align-self ➞ positioned_boxes
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ justify-self ➞ positioned_boxes
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ place-self ➞ positioned_boxes
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ iframe ➞ allow ➞ accelerometer
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. html ➞ elements ➞ iframe ➞ allow ➞ ambient-light-sensor

  37. html ➞ elements ➞ iframe ➞ allow ➞ xr-spatial-tracking
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

New entries (72)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 18 October 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Oct 21 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 14 October 2024 through Monday, 21 October 2024🔗

Browser Support Changes: +8, -0

Support increases (8)

API

  1. api ➞ CloseWatcher ➞ CloseWatcher
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ CloseWatcher
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ CloseWatcher ➞ cancel_event
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ CloseWatcher ➞ close
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ CloseWatcher ➞ close_event
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ CloseWatcher ➞ destroy
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ CloseWatcher ➞ requestClose
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ GPUCanvasContext ➞ getConfiguration
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 32

Show all 32 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (22)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 11 October 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ CookieChangeEvent ➞ CookieChangeEvent
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ CookieChangeEvent
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ CookieChangeEvent ➞ changed
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ CookieChangeEvent ➞ deleted
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ CookieStore
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ CookieStore ➞ change_event
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ CookieStore ➞ delete
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ CookieStore ➞ delete ➞ partitioned_option
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  9. api ➞ CookieStore ➞ get
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  10. api ➞ CookieStore ➞ getAll
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  11. api ➞ CookieStore ➞ set
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  12. api ➞ CookieStore ➞ set ➞ partitioned_option
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  13. api ➞ ServiceWorkerGlobalScope ➞ cookieStore
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  14. api ➞ Window ➞ cookieStore
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  15. api ➞ GPUCanvasContext ➞ configure ➞ toneMapping
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  16. api ➞ ProgressEvent ➞ worker_support
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  17. api ➞ Worker ➞ worker_support
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ display ➞ none ➞ option_is_hidden
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-position ➞ inter-character
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-position ➞ over
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-position ➞ under
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ video ➞ autoplay ➞ requires_muted_audio
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

New entries (9)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 11 October 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api ➞ GPUCanvasContext ➞ configure ➞ toneMapping
  2. api ➞ GPUCanvasContext ➞ getConfiguration
  3. api ➞ ProgressEvent ➞ worker_support
  4. api ➞ Worker ➞ worker_support

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ display ➞ none ➞ option_is_hidden
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-position ➞ inter-character
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-position ➞ over
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-position ➞ under

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ video ➞ autoplay ➞ requires_muted_audio

Removed entries (1)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Friday, 11 October 2024, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ column-fill ➞ balance-all

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Oct 14 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 7 October 2024 through Monday, 14 October 2024🔗

Browser Support Changes: +14, -0

Support increases (14)

API

  1. api ➞ MediaStreamTrack ➞ getCapabilities
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ Notification ➞ silent
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ Request ➞ Request ➞ init_priority_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ WebGL2RenderingContext ➞ unpackColorSpace
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ WebGLRenderingContext ➞ unpackColorSpace
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ CSSNestedDeclarations
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ CSSNestedDeclarations ➞ style
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ WorkerNavigator ➞ hid
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ text-emphasis-position ➞ auto
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy ➞ noopener-allow-popups
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. http ➞ headers ➞ Link ➞ fetchpriority
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

BCD Metadata Changes: 212

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (119)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 27 September 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 30 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday 23 September 2024 through Monday 30 September 2024🔗

Browser Support Changes: +0, -0

BCD Metadata Changes: 18

Show all 18 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (8)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday 20 September 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-overhang
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-overhang ➞ auto
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-overhang ➞ none
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  1 of 3 engines

MATHML

  1. mathml ➞ elements ➞ mo ➞ movablelimits
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ contentScriptGlobalScope
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
